original_text: “This applies to the Levites: from twenty-five years old and upward they shall come to do duty in the service of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 레위인은 이같이 할지니 곧 이십오 세 이상으로는 회막에 들어가서 복무하고 봉사할 것이요

sentences.original_text: from twenty-five years old and upward
they shall come to do duty
in the service of the tent of meeting.
